attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: I’m disappointed in the quality of this app. It made everything super slow, not only did it corrupt my phone but somehow throttled my internet on all devices to a crawl.

attributes.title: Upsetting
attributes.review: This app is the definition of atrocious. It is literally republican propaganda. Everyone remember the republicans “privatize the gain, publicize the fall.” They don’t care about anyone but themselves. Smh 🤦‍♀️. This app is literally used as fear mongering and needs to be removed from the App Store ASAP asap rocky.

attributes.title: Parents beware!!!
attributes.review: So I got this app and it started to tell me to do weird things like go on top of the house and watch scary videos... I think this is where the blue whale challenge starts... DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! Also Trump, stop trying to kill the children.

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: This app does not function whatsoever!! It took FOREVER to download. When it finally did...it immediately CHARGED ME MONEYYYY. I love trump but he needs to get this app fixed bc I did not want to have to dodge ads every two seconds, lord have mercy!!

attributes.title: THIS IS A HORRIBLE APP!!!😡🤬
attributes.review: When I got this app it took forever to DOWNLOAD and when I opened the app I was like “OH SHOOT ITS A RAT” then I saw rats all over my ceiling and they “JUMPED ON MY FACE” Also I tried to immediately delete the app but “IT WOULDN’T LET ME” THIS APP IS THE WORST AND I WISH I NEVER GOT IT FRICK YOU DONALD TRUMP YOU ARE THE WORST AND THATS IS WHY NOBODY LIKES YOU RAPIST/RACIST AND YOU ARE THE WORST PRESIDENT I WISH OBAMA WAS PRESIDENT AGAIN STUPID DONALD TRUMP. 😡🤬

attributes.title: don’t waste your time!!
attributes.review: this app is very disappointing, it’s so useless and just doesn’t work at all. I expected a lot more from it so i suggest to just not even waste your time with it

attributes.title: Turned me into an Oompa Loompa
attributes.review: This app is awful, it turned me into a small orange man with baby hands.  It made my 🍆 shrivel up and touch little kids.  It turned me into an idiot and a racist.  Oh wait, the app didn’t do any of this I’m just writing about trump.

upon downloading the app it told me that i was looking cute today but i told it that i was a minor. It then told me that it knew and that made it better! It proceeded to violate me in many ways and i’ve now been scared for life!

attributes.title: Worst App Ever
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever. It’s told my dog and my fish. 😞🙈🤩✨🥺😍🐱Orange used to be a favorite color😌👑🍊but now it makes me want to throw up🤩✨🙈 get a better spray tan luv❤️ and a better wig❤️ well anyways... BLM, JUSTICE FOR VANESSA GUILLEN, ARREST THE COPS WHO KILLED BREONNA TAYLOR.👑😞🤪😇 donald trump is a white supremacist.😂✨🥺❤️😍 if you vote for him again you’re a white supremacist😹🎣🤦🏻‍♀️😱😊🥰✨👁👄

attributes.title: THE DONALD TRUMP APP PARALYZED ME!!
attributes.review: I was going about my day, feeling good and having fun, then my father suggested I download the Donald Trump app. Seriously. Now, I was hesitant but figured there'd be some laughable content. The MOMENT I open the app, I fall to the ground, completely paralyzed. Worst experience of my life, 0 stars.
